description:
Loci let's you discover places and events all around you and the people there

The app brings you closer together with your friends and let's you meet new ones around these experiences.

Explore for yourself - do you want to see what's happening around you right now? Search real-time anywhere in Las Vegas, checkout music venues across London, when the best bands are playing or search your favourite team's stadium during match day.

Marquee Las Vegas

This special version also has an enhanced experience for Marquee Nightclub in Las Vegas. Download the app while in Vegas to get the Marquee experience, powered by Loci, or open the app while in Marquee to checkout the club and who's there?
releaseNotes:
- Share the content you find with your friends directly in the app
- Interact with your friends directly from the map to see what's happening around them, launch chat and get directions to them
- Share Loci content with friends who don't have the app to view in a browser
- Special Marquee Las Vegas Nightclub features for our users in Vegas
